channel.title: A Few Noob Questions that I need answered
channel.description:
1) How can I change the way my NPC's face? 2) I've set RangeX and RangeY and changed the walktype to 2, in autospawn.cfg yet the monsters will will not walk around. 3) Somebody please give me the codes, or a freaking link to PROPER working potions. (I.E strength potions, your strength loweres from 117 strength back to 99 within a set of time etc) 4) How the freaking FUCK do I fix this:
[code]client.java:17812: code too large public void parseIncomingPackets() { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I can't remember the last thing I edited :(

item.title: A Few Noob Questions that I need answered
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

[quote=“zilchuary, post:7, topic:192249”]it aint going to
you cannot add cases that need voids
when will people LEARN![/quote]

The answer to that is: When you teach us.

Read full topic

item.title: A Few Noob Questions that I need answered
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

[quote=“adog17x, post:2, topic:192249”]str pots , maybe this will work, not sure

[code]case 2440:
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[2] += abc2;
sendFrame126("@yel@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
deleteItem(2440, GetItemSlot(2440), 1);
addItem(159, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
GoOn = false;
case 157:
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[2] += abc2;
sendFrame126("@yel@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
deleteItem(157, GetItemSlot(157), 1);
addItem(159, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
GoOn = false;
break;

case 159:
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[2] += abc2;
sendFrame126("@yel@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
deleteItem(159, GetItemSlot(159), 1);
addItem(161, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
GoOn = false;
break;

case 161:
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[2] += abc2;
sendFrame126("@yel@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
deleteItem(161, GetItemSlot(161), 1);
addItem(229, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
GoOn = false;
break;
[/code][/quote]
you leeched that form a source lol
if you add that code you need to
declare it
add voids
… loads of shit
it will work ut there is no point in taking alot of time to do it

Read full topic

item.title: A Few Noob Questions that I need answered
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

  1. How can I change the way my NPC’s face?
  2. I’ve set RangeX and RangeY and changed the walktype to 2, in autospawn.cfg yet the monsters will will not walk around.
  3. Somebody please give me the codes, or a freaking link to PROPER working potions. (I.E strength potions, your strength loweres from 117 strength back to 99 within a set of time etc)
  4. How the freaking FUCK do I fix this:

client.java:17812: code too large public void parseIncomingPackets() { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

I can’t remember the last thing I edited
